description: Try our easy to follow Raspberry & White Chocolate Tiramisu recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Raspberry & White Chocolate Tiramisu Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: For a really indulgent and spectacular finish, tie with ribbon, completely cover the top of the Tiramisu with three punnets of raspberries and dust with icing sugar. Cut some of the chocolate squares in half to make triangles and sit amongst raspberries on top of the cake (as pictured above).

For a really indulgent and spectacular finish, tie with ribbon, completely cover the top of the Tiramisu with three punnets of raspberries and dust with icing sugar. Cut some of the chocolate squares in half to make triangles and sit amongst raspberries on top of the cake (as pictured above).
